elements.name: TC2 - Verify that the user is able to add three consecutive action block successfully

steps.name: Open application and skip to dashboard
On Action Block screen, tap on add new trigger icon
User taps on "Action block name" text
User enters the text "Description action block 1"
On Action Block detail screen, tap on add new input variable icon
User enters "This is a testing string" into field "enter_variable_dialog_value"

elements.name: TC1 - Verify that the user is able to add three consecutive macros successfully

steps.name: Open application and skip to dashboard
On Macro Page, tap on add new trigger icon
On Macro Page, tap on add new action icon
On Macro Page, tap on add new constraint icon
User taps on "Airplane Mode Disabled" text
On Macro Page, tap on add new variable icon

elements.name: TC4 - Verify that the user is able to create - play - pause - reset StopWatch

steps.name: Open application and skip to dashboard
User stays on this screen for 2 seconds

elements.name: TC3 - Verify that the user is able to add - update - delete Variables

steps.name: Open application and skip to dashboard

cells: Are you sure you wish to delete this variable?
